participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Straightforward and inquisitive, Jake is determined and has a strong sense of duty.
participant_1.background: my grandfather served in world war a. i'm in the army. i did not graduate high school. i live in canada.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.personality: Warm-hearted and nurturing, Linda has a passion for helping others and an appreciation for simple pleasures.
participant_2.background: i'm a retired gym teacher. cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i was poor growing up. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i like watching war documentaries.
